#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,number;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>number;
		int sum=1;
		int j;
		if(number%2 == 0)
		{

			for( j=2;j*j <= number;++j)
			{
				if(number%j == 0)
				{
				sum += j;
				sum += number/j;
				}
				
			}

			j--;
			
			if( j*j == number) {sum -=j;}
			cout<<sum<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			
			for(j=3;j*j<=number;j +=2)
			{
				if(number%j == 0){
				sum += j;
				sum += number/j;}
			}
		
			j-=2;
			if( j*j == number) sum -= j;
			cout<<sum<<endl;
		}
		
	}
}
